title: Down syndrome CPC S1
characteristics_ch1.1: cell type: in vitro differentiated cells
extract_protocol_ch1: Down syndrome and isogenic normal human iPSCs were differentiated for 24 days in vitro. Subconfluent DIV24 cells were harvested in Trizol lysis buffer (Qiagen RNAeasy). Total RNA  was collected using the RNAeasy reagent (Qiagen) following the manufacturer’s instructions.
extract_protocol_ch1.1: mRNA-seq libraries were prepared from 1 ug of total RNA using the Illumina mRNA-seq Sample Preparation kit following the manufacturer’s instructions
data_processing: Raw dat was aligned to the transcriptome derived from UCSC genome assembly hg19, using STAR with default parameters.
data_processing.1: Read counts for each transcript were measured using feature Counts
data_processing.2: Differentilly expressed genes were determined using DESeq2 and a cut-off of 0.05 on adjusted p-valus (corrected for multipple hypotheses testing) was used fro creating lists and heatmaps.
